SPEED AND CONSUMPTION ARE VALID ONLY UP TO AND INCLUDING BEAUFORT FORCE 4
(11-16 KNOTS) AND TOTAL COMBINED (SEA AND SWELL) SIGNIFICANT WAVE HEIGHT
CONFINED TO LIMITS OF DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 (0.5-1.25 METRES) WITH NO ADVERSE
CURRENTS.
IT IS UNDERSTOOD THAT THE TIME DURING WHICH THERE IS BAD WEATHER WITH WIND
EXCEEDING BEAUFORT FORCE 4 AND/OR DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 UNDER OPPOSING CURRENT
WILL NOT BE TAKEN INTO CONSIDERATION FOR THE CALCULATION OF THE PERFORMANCE.
ECO SPEED AND CONSUMPTION:
AT SEA
(BALLST)   ABT 13KTS       ABT. 21.0 MT IFO 380CST+ 0.1 MT LSMGO
(LADEN)    ABT 12KTS      ABT. 22.0 MT IFO 380CST+ 0.1 MT LSMGO
IN PORT: (IDLE)            ABT. 2.5 MT IFO 380CST + 0.1 MT LSMGO
(WORKING using crane)    ABT.4.5 MT IFO 380CST + 0.1 MT LSMGO
Additional 1mt ifo per day in port for boiler in cold weather.
ABOUT IS UNDERSTOOD TO MEAN 0.5KNOTS DOWNWARDS ALLOWANCE THE SPEED AND 5%
UPWARDS ALLOWANCE INTHE CONSUMPTION.
